allow: Bash(for file in deploy-opnsense-vlans.yml opnsense-deploy.yml configure-opnsense-boot.yml download-opnsense.yml create-opnsense-vm.yml)
Bash(for word in bloom coral frost raven stone storm)
Bash(SSHPASS='JoY5TiCk-pAram3ter-buff3r-quOtabL3-th1ng' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no debian@192.168.1.20 "sudo systemctl status portainer semaphore | grep -E ''Active:|●''")
Bash(SSHPASS='4gency-5ilica-dec3PtiOn-p0Ppy-cath0use' sshpass -e ssh debian@192.168.1.20 'cd /opt/privatebox && sudo git pull')
Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=5 root@10.10.10.1 "hostname && uname -a")
Bash(SSHPASS='alpine' sshpass -e ssh root@192.168.1.17 "grep -E ''root|location'' /etc/nginx/http.d/default.conf 2>/dev/null || grep -E ''root|location'' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf | head -10")
Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o ConnectTimeout=5 root@192.168.1.109 "opnsense-version && echo ''---'' && ls -la /conf/config.xml")
Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.173 "opnsense-version && echo ''---'' && ifconfig | grep -E ''^vtnet|inet '' | head -20")
Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.173 "ls -la /conf/config.xml && echo ''---'' && ifconfig -l")
Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.173 "ifconfig vtnet1 | grep vlan")

Bash(SSHPASS='opnsense' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@192.168.1.173 "sed -i ''s/10\.10\.20\.10/10.10.10.10/g'' /tmp/config_new.xml && sed -i ''s/>opt3</>opt2</g'' /tmp/config_new.xml && echo ''DNS references updated''")
